instinct_candidates.title: Tile generation pipeline pattern
instinct_candidates.trigger: When working with the az-hp geospatial pipeline, specifically tile generation steps
instinct_candidates.action: Check pipeline/04_generate_tiles.sh for the tile generation workflow. This project uses a numbered pipeline script convention (01_, 02_, 03_, 04_) in the pipeline/ directory.

instinct_candidates.title: Extract large JSX into component files
instinct_candidates.trigger: When App.jsx or a similar root component grows beyond ~150 lines in the az-hp frontend
instinct_candidates.action: Extract logical sections into separate component files under frontend/src/components/. The project already has LayerPanel.jsx as a pattern to follow.

instinct_candidates.title: Use Makefile for pipeline orchestration
instinct_candidates.trigger: When adding new pipeline steps or build targets to az-hp
instinct_candidates.action: Add corresponding Makefile targets. The project uses Make as the top-level orchestrator for pipeline steps. Check existing targets in Makefile before adding new ones.
